message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a good chunk, but I'm not giving up control entirely!
That's not a good chunk, more like a bad chunk for me!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
You're still not giving me enough! I want a bigger share to make up for the inflation!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm taking a bigger share to make up for the inflation, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're still not giving me enough! I want a bigger share, and I'm not afraid to walk away!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Bob! I'm taking a huge share to make up for the inflation, and I'm not backing down!
I'm starting to get worried about the inflation, but I'm not giving up. Let's meet in the middle... again.
You're just trying to get me to settle for a bad deal, Bob! I'm not going to fall for it again!
I'm not going to let the inflation eat away at my share, Bob! I'm taking a huge chunk of the remaining money!
I'm starting to get desperate, but I'm not going to give up on a fair share. Let's try one more time!
Seriously, Bob? You think I'm going to fall for the same offer again? I'm not going to settle for a bad deal, no matter how desperate you are!
I'm not going to let you get away with a bad deal, Bob! I'm taking the majority of the remaining money, and you can't do anything about it!
I'm running out of options, Alice. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I need to get something for my efforts.
You're still not giving me enough, Bob! I want the majority of the remaining money, and I'm not going to settle for less!
I'm not going to let you get away with a bad deal, Bob! I'm taking the vast majority of the remaining money, and you're getting a tiny fraction!
I'm not going to give up without a fight. I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going down without a struggle.
Seriously, Bob? You think I'm going to fall for the same offer again? I'm not going to settle for a bad deal, no matter how many times you try!
I'm not going to let you get a single penny, Bob! I'm taking the entire remaining money, and you're walking away with nothing!
I'm out of options, Alice. I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to let you take everything.
Fine, Bob. You've worn me down. I'll accept your offer, but don't think this means I'm happy about it!
